name: Wild West Duel
description:
Wild West Duel is a multiplayer game where you can face your friend in a gun duel competition. 

NOTE! Wild West Duel is a prototype and was made for learning purposes. The main goal with this project was to gain a knowledge about UE4 OSS and Steam integration.

You can play via Steam or LAN. The game uses development Steam App ID 480.


Just log in to your Steam account and play via Steam P2P network.


Log out from your Steam account and play on your private LAN Network.

Join our Discord server and find mates to play.

1. Download
2. Unzip
3.Run WildWestDuel.exe and have fun :)
